CustomField.description: Used to store values for specified Opportunity fields - either static value (e.g. "Carnet 2019") or dynamic value (e.g. Account.Anzahl_PKW__c).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Provide static ("Carnet 2019") or dynamic (Account.Anzahl_PKW__c) field values.
CustomField.label: Opp Field Value/Acc Field Mapping
